entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is a person who appears in the picture and interacts with Harry Potter. He is described as having a blindfolded head.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is a person mentioned by Phineas Nigellus as having more important things on his mind than the eccentricities of Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is a person whose eccentricities are mentioned by Phineas Nigellus and Professor Snape.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who interacts with Phineas Nigellus. He is called out by Hermione when he punches the air in excitement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who calls out to Harry Potter when she sees him punching the air.

relationships.description: Phineas Nigellus mentions Professor Snape as having more important things on his mind than Albus Dumbledore's eccentricities.
Phineas Nigellus talks about the many eccentricities of Albus Dumbledore.
Harry Potter interacts with Phineas Nigellus in the picture.
Hermione calls out to Harry Potter when she sees him punching the air.
